TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISchedulerJob

Docs.summary: Manages the tasks and resources that are associated with a job.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddExcludedNodes(class Microsoft.Hpc.Scheduler.IStringCollection nodeNames) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds the specified nodes to the list of nodes that should not be used for the job.

Docs.summary: Adds the task to the job.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllocatedNodes As IStringCollection

Docs.summary: Retrieves the names of the nodes that have been allocated to run the tasks in the job or have run the tasks.
Docs.value: An interface that contains the names of the nodes that have been allocated to run the tasks in the job or have run the tasks.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.AutoCalculateMax : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Determines whether the scheduler automatically calculates the maximum resource value.
Docs.value: Is true if the scheduler calculates the maximum value; otherwise, false if the application specifies the value.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.AutoCalculateMin : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Determines whether the scheduler automatically calculates the minimum resource value.
Docs.value: Is true if the scheduler calculates the minimum value; otherwise, false if the application specifies the value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanGrow As Boolean

Docs.summary: Determines whether the job resources can grow.
Docs.value: Is true if the job resources can grow as more resources become available; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.CanPreempt : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Determines whether another job can preempt this job.
Docs.value: Is true if another job can preempt this job; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanShrink As Boolean

Docs.summary: Determines whether the job resources can shrink.
Docs.value: Is true if the server releases extra resources when they are no longer needed by the job; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChangeTime As DateTime

Docs.summary: Retrieves the last time that the user or server changed a property of the job.
Docs.value: The date and time that the job was last touched. The value is in Coordinated Universal Time.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MaxCoresPerNode : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the maximum number of cores that a node can have for the job to run on it.
Docs.value: The maximum number of cores.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MaximumNumberOfCores : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the maximum number of cores that the scheduler may allocate for the job.
Docs.value: The maximum number of cores.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MaximumNumberOfNodes : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the maximum number of nodes that the scheduler may allocate for the job.
Docs.value: The maximum number of nodes.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MaximumNumberOfSockets : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the maximum number of sockets that the scheduler may allocate for the job.
Docs.value: The maximum number of sockets.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MaxMemory : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the maximum amount of memory that a node may have for the job to run on it.
Docs.value: The maximum amount of memory, in megabytes, that a node may have for the job to run on it.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MinCoresPerNode : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the minimum number of cores that a node must have for the job to run on it.
Docs.value: The minimum number of cores on a node that the job requires.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MinimumNumberOfCores : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the minimum number of cores that the job requires to run.
Docs.value: The minimum number of cores.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MinimumNumberOfNodes : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the minimum number of nodes that the job requires to run.
Docs.value: The minimum number of nodes.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MinimumNumberOfSockets : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the minimum number of sockets that the job requires to run.
Docs.value: The minimum number of sockets.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.MinMemory : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Retrieves or sets the minimum amount of memory that a node must have for the job to run on it.
Docs.value: The minimum amount of memory, in megabytes, that a node must have for the job to run on it.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.NotifyOnCompletion : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether or not you want to receive e-mail notification when then job ends.
Docs.value: A the indicates whether or not you want to receive e-mail notification when then job ends. True indicates that you want to receive e-mail notification when then job ends. False indicates that you do not want to receive e-mail notification when then job ends.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.NotifyOnStart : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets whether or not you want to receive e-mail notification when then job starts.
Docs.value: A the indicates whether or not you want to receive e-mail notification when then job starts. True indicates that you want to receive e-mail notification when then job starts. False indicates that you do not want to receive e-mail notification when then job starts.

Docs.summary: An event that is raised when the state of the job changes.
An event that is raised when the state of one of the tasks in the job changes.
